MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Gabbs Project in Nevada, United States dated January 2021.pdf

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Gabbs Project in Nevada, United States dated January 2021.pdf
document.description: This technical report provides an updated mineral resource estimate for the Gabbs gold-copper property located in Nye County, Nevada, USA, detailing the geology, mineralization, resource estimates, and proposed exploration program.
